ygData.subject: Magicians and wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I was going through somma my old mail I never read and a guy was asking about a magician and wizard...there not similar at all at level 50 my wizard
ygData.messageBody:
Well I was going through somma my old mail I never read and a guy was asking
about a magician and wizard...there not similar at all at level 50 my wizard
friend does 1200...which Im sure you all know and the magician does 850 and a
wave spell of 300 each and has 3 waves....Well I was wondering if the slime
pet is real a level 43 mag said he researched it with his other charecter but
I dont beilive him but thats supposed to be there ultimate spell....Does
anyone know?
